name: DrakeAttack
description:
Just a simple shooter, you have to kill enemies to get 100 points and bullets penetrates crab an flicker and drakes are double the fast (crab gives 2 points and drake gives 1 point)

this is my first game, made in construct.com

i updated it after 7 hours of the first release

still has some bugs like restrt not working and you lost not working
